body.name: LED Desk Lamp for Home Office- 24W Double Head Desk Light with clamp, 5 Lighting Modes, 11 Brightness Levels, Adjustable Gooseneck Lamp with Timer- Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 19 hrs 2 mins
features: 【Powerful Illumination】: Enjoy a 24W high-power desk lamp with a 31-inch long light strip, providing even and ample illumination for your entire workspace.
【Customizable Lighting】: Tailor your lighting with 5 adjustable color temperatures and 11 brightness levels. The memory function ensures your preferred settings are always ready.

【Flexible & Versatile Design】: Our desk lamp features a 360° gooseneck and 180° foldable swing arm, allowing you to adjust the lamp to any angle. The lamp head rotates 270°, giving you precise control over your lighting.
【Eye-Protection Features】: Say goodbye to flicker, glint, glare, and harmful blue light. The lamp includes a 45-minute auto-off reminder to promote timely breaks and protect your eyes.
【Energy Efficient & Long-Lasting】: With integrated, long-lasting LEDs, our desk lamp consumes 80% less energy than traditional bulbs. Say goodbye to frequent bulb replacements and high energy bills.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Brighter, Wider Range, More Professional - Whether you need a comfortable reading light, focused office illumination, or a relaxed ambient glow, our dual-head LED desk lamp fulfills all your expectations.

AdjustaGlow: Dual-Head Lamp Mastery Versatile dual-head lamp—adjust height, angle, and light range at your whim. Illuminate any space precisely to suit your needs! True Colors: RAI Over 90! Experience true-to-life colors with our desk lamp, boasting an RAI over 90. Illuminate spaces authentically, revealing objects in their full, vibrant hues! 27.5 Inches: Wide Workspace Glow！ Elevate your lighting experience! Our desk lamp reaches up to 27.5 inches, casting a wider, even glow across your entire workspace for optimal illumination. Shadow-Free Dual Brilliance! Revolutionize your lighting with dual sources for even, shadow-free illumination. Protect your eyes while enjoying brilliant, uniform brightness.

Healthy Lighting This desk lamp features eye-friendly LED bulbs, free from flicker and blue light, offering you comfortable and gentle illumination. Auto-Shutoff Timer Switch When you activate this switch, it will automatically turn off after 45 minutes to encourage timely breaks and protect your eyes.

24W Adapter: Uninterrupted Brilliance! Efficient brilliance awaits! Our desk lamp, paired with a stable 24W output adapter, ensures consistent power for uninterrupted illumination. Easy Installation With its flexible and adjustable clamp design, it won't take up space on your desk and can securely attach to desks up to 2.7 inches thick."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great light for any desk
reviews.reviewText: Clamps are strong and can attach to any desk. Design is great so it can swivel in any direction or as low or high as you want. Like how there are 3 light types - warm, white, and natural looking light. Brightness can be adjusted as well. Great for when I had a dark apartment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING LED Desk Lamp
reviews.reviewText: It was amazing when I received this LED desk lamp. I installed this lamp on my son's study desk, and it's cool; the lamp has different color modes (white/light yellow/and yellow colors). Meanwhile, you can make the lamp bright based on your needs. The most impressive part is that the lamp position can be adjusted( see my attached photos circled in yellow) to different angles that achieve your desired location so the light can focus on specific parts. OMG....I love it; it saves energy as it's LED light, and it also provides my son with a good study environment. If you are considering buying a desk lamp, this one will be your good choice, trust me :-)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Only thing i dislike is the length of the cord... perfectly bright, easy to move and angle as long as you adjust the tension with the nobbies, and im very happy that it's a USB plug.The back side of the light does get a little warm if you have it on the brightest setting, but it shouldn't do any harm. I've had this lamp for a few months now and use it at either at full brightness, or half for around 8 hours a day, most days. Sometimes around 10-12 cause i leave it on cause my rooms normal light is too bright for my wimpy eyes, but it's still working great. I sometimes hold the light to warm my hands; not an intended feature, but a welcomed one!Picture is with the brightness all the way up in an otherwise pitch black room cause it was night time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect addition to the bed room
reviews.reviewText: I work from home and this is perfect for zoom meetings! It’s super firm. I like it that I can adjust brightness and set a timer. This is the perfect addition to my bed room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good lamp with easy operation
reviews.reviewText: I bought one silimar desk lamp before and it works well, so I bought one more for the other desk work. This one's buttons are on the top of lamp and leave more space on the desk, it works well with multuple lights adjustment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars highly cost effective
reviews.reviewText: excellent quality and reasonable price，It is also easy to install。do not occupy space，The brightness is soft and not harsh，quite satisfied

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Reasonably priced, but power supply could be improved.
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a new desk light for my desktop, preferably something that wouldn't take up much space which is exactly what I wanted in this light when I found it. A lot cheaper than the other similar styled lights on Amazon, but the one thing that stuck out to me which is probably why it was cheaper, is the power supply. The light is powered by a single usb cord which is not even 4ft long. The way it's mounted on my desk, the cord doesn't even reach the floor which is where my power outlet is! Luckily I have my PC nearby so I can plug it in there, but since I bought two of these lights, now I'm losing 2 valuable USB port in my system. Really wish this light came with an adapter or a longer cord for the usb to reach anything. Really disappointed with that.Besides the whole power supply complaint, the light itself was easy to assemble and clamp. It's bright and both the brightness and "warmth" can be adjusted to your liking. The arms extend and rotate as needed while not feeling cheap or breakable. I can't fully recommend this light due to the usb issue, but if that doesn't bother you or you have something to plug this into which is less than 3ft away then go for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Eco friendly choice
reviews.reviewText: Very eco friendly choice. Love the LED lights and like the design. Safe energy and at the same time provide a really bright and high quality source of lightening. Have a variety of brightness options to cater my different needs, whether it’s leisure or studying or gaming.
